title: I’ll Help You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Nozomi~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, Ai-chan. Welcome in.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Sorry for the sudden call.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Don’t worry about it. But why did you want to come while I’m working? What’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I want you to help me pick something.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What omamori amulet should I get for my big sis? She’s due for a hospital exam soon. Though she said it’ll just be a regular exam......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, so you’re worried about your beloved big sis.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Rest assured! I’ll help you pick the perfect omamori!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thank you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
